_sText:
GO4CSS Mod beta v1.2

GO4CSS is exact port of CS:GO maps to CS:S.

Includes:

- CS:GO de_dust2_beta3 map
- CS:GO de_dust_beta3 map
- CS:GO de_inferno_csgo map
- CS:GO de_lake_go4css_beta1 map
- CS:GO de_nuke_go4css_beta2 map
- CS:GO de_train_csgo map
- CS:GO Blood Decals
- CS:GO Weapons Sounds
- CS:GO Footsteps Sounds
- CS:GO Bullet Impact Sounds

Features:

- Radar/HDR/Color Correction/Bots Navigation/Optimizations for higher FPS
- Everything is packed in bsp files, so mod will not overwrite game textures or sounds.

Authors of GO4CSS:

b00bs & Saidteshnologi

Changelog from v1.1 to v1.2:

- fixed disappearing models after alt-tab
- fixed conflicts with original dust2-dust maps
- fixed loudness of footsteps sounds
- dust radar corrected
- added helicopter to dust map
- and other small corrections.
